1031.name: AA M37-42
1031.Applications: 375-450 HB, hardfacing and rebuilding alloy for wornout wheels, rails, tires, conveyors, crossings, shafts, bufferlayers prior to hardfacing. excelent wear and abrasion resistance against heavy impact and shock, machinable with carbide tools.
1031.Suitable_For: Conveyors and transport surfaces, tires, bucket and loader teeth, cruscher jaws, Bufferlayers, crane wheels, axis, gear parts, winches etc.
